titleStmt.title: Reasons offered to the consideration of His Grace, His Majesties High Commissioner, and the Hononrable [sic] Estates of Parliament, by several salt-masters, against the Act for a manufactorie of salt npon [sic] salt, given in by Mr. William Areskin Governour of Blackness Castle.
titleStmt.author: Erskine, William, d. 1700.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
